string:
Specify your language view keys as it's shown for each video. Each key -> value must be on a new line. Keys go before "->" sign. If you switch app or system language you have to reset this setting.

Examples:
English: 10K views = K -> 1000, views -> views
Spanish: 10 K vistas = K -> 1000, vistas -> views
"Hide videos with less than 1,000 views exposed to the home feed. Some videos, including those from channels you subscribe to, may not be hidden even if they have fewer than 1,000 views."
